column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A suspect was spotted hiding on the roof of a house trying to steal property near Tuol Sangke Primary School in Toul Sangke 1
column4: Russey Keo district.------According to the source
column6: the suspect had climbed onto the roof of a house
column7: attempting to break into the property when residents living nearby saw him and started throwing stones and shouting
column8: causing the suspect to run to the back of the house
column9: jump down and try to run away.------Following a brief chase
column10: the suspect was brought down with a knock to the head
column11: causing heavy bleeding.------The suspect was then taken to Tuol Sangke Police Station 1 for questioning. ------NKD
